name: The Unstoppable Miss Pip
description:
No one can stop Miss Pip!

Wield Miss Pip's devastating arsenal to defeat the enemies and get a high score! Miss Pip can roll to avoid damage, but each time she does her weapon randomly changes too! 

[Created in 48hr for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Theme: Roll of the Dice]

Controls:

A, D - Move

Space - Roll (when indicator not flashing)

Left Click - Shoot

Mouse - Aim

Credits:

QuietCave - Programming, Design, SFX

wren // 773tk - Graphics, Design

Trial & Error / Sakagami Souichi - Music

hicc - Font
